powermeter/sensor_unit/init.c

00001 #include <stdio.h>
00002 #include <avr/io.h>
00003 #include <stdlib.h>
00004 #include <avr/interrupt.h>
00005 
00006 #define OCR0_1MS        14
00007 
00008 /*
00009   * Initialize timer0 to use the main crystal clock and the output
00010   * compare interrupt feature to generate an interrupt approximately
00011   * once per millisecond to use as a general purpose time base.
00012   */
00013 void init_timer_0(void) {
00014         TCCR0 = 0;
00015         TIMSK |= (1<<OCIE0);         /* enable output compare interrupt */
00016         TCCR0  = (1<<WGM01)|(1<<CS02)|(0<<CS01)|(1<<CS00); /* CTC, prescale = 1024 */
00017         TCNT0  = 0;
00018         OCR0   = OCR0_1MS;                     /* match in aprox 1 ms,  */
00019 }
00020 
00023 void init_timer_2(void) {
00024         TCCR2 = 0;
00025         TCNT2 = 0;
00026         TCCR2 = (1<<WGM21) | (0<<WGM20) | (1<<CS22) | (0<<CS21) | (0<<CS20); //Normal operation, toggle on compare, prescale clk/64     
00027         TIFR |= (1<<OCF2);
00028         OCR2 = 30;      //Will trigger an interrupt each with an interval of 130us
00029         TIMSK |= (1<<OCIE2);
00030 }
00031 
00032 void init_ports(void) {
00033         DDRA = 0xFC;
00034         PORTA = 0x00;
00035         DDRB = 0x1F;
00036         PORTB = 0x00;
00037         DDRC = 0x03;
00038         PORTC = 0x00;
00039         DDRD = 0x86;
00040         PORTD = (1<<0) | (1<<1) | (1<<3) | (1<<4) | (1<<5);
00041         
00042         //PORTD = (1<<3) | (1<<4) | (1<<5);
00043 }
